All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmbientLight
AmbientLight class represents ambient light in a scene.
Camera
The Camera class represents a virtual camera used for rendering images through ray tracing.
Circle
The Circle class represents a two-dimensional circle in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
Color
Wrapper class for java.awt.Color.
Cylinder
The Cylinder class represents a three-dimensional cylinder in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
DirectionalLight
DirectionalLight class represents a directional light source in a scene.
Double3
Double3 class represents a triad of three double-precision numbers.
Geometries
The Geometries class represents a collection of intersectable geometries in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
Geometry
The Geometry abstract class is the base class for all geometries that require a normalized vector.
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
Intersectable
The Intersectable abstract class represents a 3D geometric shape that can be intersected with a ray.
Intersectable.GeoPoint
The GeoPoint inner class holds a Geometry object and the corresponding intersection point.
LightSource
LightSource is an interface representing a light source in a scene.
LightsTests
Test rendering a basic image
Main
Test program for the 1st stage
Material
Material class represents the properties of a material used for shading.
Plane
The Plane class represents a plane in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
Point
Point class represents a point in 3D space with coordinates (x, y, z).
PointLight
PointLight class represents a point light source in a scene.
Polygon
The Polygon class represents a two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
PolygonTests
Testing Polygons
ProjectTest
author noga and noa Project Test - the picture
Ray
Ray class represents a ray in 3D space, consisting of a starting point (p0) and a direction vector (dir).
RayTracerBase
The abstract class RayTracerBase serves as the base class for ray tracing algorithms.
RayTracerBasic
The class RayTracerBasic extends RayTracerBase and is responsible for performing ray tracing calculations to render a 3D scene.
RenderTests
Test rendering a basic image
Scene
Scene class represents the 3D world to be rendered, containing geometries, lights, and other properties.
Scene.SceneBuilder
Nested static class for Scene Builder.
SceneDescriptor
SceneDescriptor class helps with parsing XML files and initializing the scene's attributes, lights, spheres, and triangles.
ShadowTests
Testing basic shadows
Sphere
Sphere class represents a three-dimensional sphere in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
SpotLight
SpotLight is a type of light source that emits a directional light with a narrowing effect.
Triangle
Triangle class represents a three-dimensional triangle in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
Tube
Tube class represents a tube in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g., controlling accuracy and performing numerical checks.
Vector
Vector class represents a three-dimensional vector in 3D space.
